name: INUIAddVoiceShortcutButtonStyle
desc: The styles for the Add to Siri button.

items.name: case black
items.desc: A button with a black background.

items.name: case blackOutline
items.desc: A button with a black background, and a border outlining the button.

items.name: case white
items.desc: A button with a white background.

items.name: case whiteOutline
items.desc: A button with a white background, and a border outlining the button.
